SELECT NOTICE_NO, MEM_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, REGDATE, STATUS, VIEWS, LAG(NOTICE_NO, 1,0) OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO ) PREV_NUM, LAG(NOTICE_TITLE, 1,0) OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO ) PREV_TITLE FROM NOTICE
SELECT NOTICE_NO, MEM_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, REGDATE, STATUS, VIEWS, LEAD(NOTICE_TITLE) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) AS NEXT_NOTICE_TITLE FROM NOTICE
